name: Dr Ben's Zombie Survival
description:
Full tagline (Dr Ben is stranded on the farm. Alone and afraid he must blow down his adversaries, its that or get eaten alive.)

Scattered around the farm is numerous ways to  enhance your means of survival. Dr Ben, 1 man against endlessly spawning zombergies. Will you fall to the hordes or rise to the top?

The pic used in the loading screen belongs respectfully to this roblox game.

https://www.roblox.com/games/143945208/CALL-OF-DUTY-BLACK-OPS-ZOMBIES-CITY
